label: ReferencePrice
comment: A reference to a sum of money for which something is or may be bought or sold.

datatypeProperties.comment: A quantity on which the reference price is based.
The monetary value of a charged reference price.
The code specifying the comparison method for this reference price.
An indication of whether or not the reference price is a net price.

referencedBy.comment: A price that provides a trade comparison with this trade price.
